To proceed, select ‘Use Now’ to use your reward. If you select ‘Use Later’, your reward will be stored in ‘My Wallet’ for later use. To exit, click ‘X’, points will NOT be deducted.
Pass your phone to the counter staff to key in the pin code.
Any subsequent redemptions made within the day will be free of charge. Delivered within 5 working days.
Please note the cut off is every 23rd of the month. You will receive your vouchers on the 30th or 31st of the month or the next working day if it falls on weekends or public holidays.
(Delivery cut-off date is on every 8th & 26th of the month. e.g. You will receive on 15th May if redemption is made on 27th April.)

Enter any remarks regarding the receipt

On sale of every Product; you will receive Primary Points and Secondary Points on the App. You can use the Primary Points to redeem rewards within the app; whereas, Secondary Points are those that get accumulated in your account to reward your customers when they make a sale. These accumulated Secondary Points will be added back to your Primary Points Wallet after 12 months from the date they were awarded in case your customers have not made a sale.
Click on the receipts to get started
